name: My last winter
description:
She left with her suitcase full of illusions, half projects, the desire to start, willpower... but the real world will show her how hard it is to fight for your dream when you have to work to pay the bills and almost no time to move on.

Only three winters to fulfill her dream, then she will have to return to her parents' house, study at the university and forget about becoming an artist who lives off her art.
